snippet: The desire to dust off the old bassoon and play again often strikes in middle age. But can the cluttered mind puts aside thoughts of children and taxes long enough to practice long tones?
abstract: Older music students, both those seeking to brush up on skills learned in their youth and those picking up an instrument for the first time, are turning to private teachers, conservatories and online classes for instruction.
lead_paragraph: The desire to dust off the old bassoon and play again often strikes in middle age. But can the cluttered mind puts aside thoughts of children and taxes long enough to practice long tones?

headline.seo: In Middle Age, Reviving Dreams of Playing Music
headline.main: Reviving Musical Dreams in Middle Age
headline.print_headline: Reviving Musical Dreams in Middle Age
